record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - September 27, 2007)

[Page: H10994]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on September 27, 2007, I missed three rollcall votes. I was unavoidably detained at a medical appointment. Had I been present, I would have voted "no" on rollcall No. 919, "yes" on rollcall No. 920 and "no" on rollcall No. 921, final passage of HR 3121, the Flood Insurance Reform and Modernization Act.
